ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 您可以<color=#FFF800FF>拖动摇杆</color>来控制您英雄和队伍的<color=#FFF800FF>移动</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 您可以<color=#FFF800FF>拖动摇杆</color>来控制您英雄和队伍的<color=#FFF800FF>移动</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Use the joystick to move your Hero and troops.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 使用<color=#FFF800FF>集火</color>可以让您的部队击中<color=#FFF800FF>攻击</color>当前<color=#FFF800FF>选中的目标</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 使用<color=#FFF800FF>集火</color>可以让您的部队击中<color=#FFF800FF>攻击</color>当前<color=#FFF800FF>选中的目标</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Use Focus Fire to order all your troops to attack the currently selected target.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: <color=#FFF800FF>跟随</color>按钮可以让您的部队进入<color=#FFF800FF>跟随状态</color>，队伍与英雄将<color=#FFF800FF>同步移动</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: <color=#FFF800FF>跟随</color>按钮可以让您的部队进入<color=#FFF800FF>跟随状态</color>，队伍与英雄将<color=#FFF800FF>同步移动</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Use Follow to order your troops to move with your Hero.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 您可以点击<color=#FFF800FF>攻击按钮</color>来选择队伍的<color=#FFF800FF>攻击目标</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 您可以点击<color=#FFF800FF>攻击按钮</color>来选择队伍的<color=#FFF800FF>攻击目标</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Use Attack to select a target for your troops.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 跟随教学
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 跟随教学
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: "Follow" Tutorial

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: <color=#FFF800FF>跟随</color>按钮可以让您的部队进入<color=#FFF800FF>跟随状态</color>，队伍与英雄将<color=#FFF800FF>同步移动</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: <color=#FFF800FF>跟随</color>按钮可以让您的部队进入<color=#FFF800FF>跟随状态</color>，队伍与英雄将<color=#FFF800FF>同步移动</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Use Follow to order your troops to move with your Hero.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: <color=#FFF800FF>使用跟随</color>，躲避<color=#FFF800FF>3次技能</color>({0}/{1})
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: <color=#FFF800FF>使用跟随</color>，躲避<color=#FFF800FF>3次技能</color>({0}/{1})
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Use Follow to dodge 3 skills.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 您可以在训练界面<color=#FFF800FF>训练士兵</color>或<color=#FFF800FF>升级科技</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 您可以在训练界面<color=#FFF800FF>训练士兵</color>或<color=#FFF800FF>升级科技</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: You can train troop or upgrade tech on the training screen.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>士兵头像</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>士兵头像</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Tap troop avatar.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>训练</color>按钮，训练<color=#FFF800FF>3个矮人步兵</color>({0}/{1})
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>训练</color>按钮，训练<color=#FFF800FF>3个矮人步兵</color>({0}/{1})
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Tap Train to train 3 Dwarf Infantry.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 士兵的<color=#FFF800FF>训练进度</color>可以查看左上角的小兵头像处<color=#FFF800FF>进度条</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 士兵的<color=#FFF800FF>训练进度</color>可以查看左上角的小兵头像处<color=#FFF800FF>进度条</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: The troops training progress can be seen on the top left corner under troop avatar.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>科技</color>页签，可以在科技页签提升<color=#FFF800FF>人口等级</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>科技</color>页签，可以在科技页签提升<color=#FFF800FF>人口等级</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Tap Tech tab, increase your Supply Cap in tech screen.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>人口</color>升级，每级人口升级提升<color=#FFF800FF>5人口</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>人口</color>升级，每级人口升级提升<color=#FFF800FF>5人口</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Tap Supply Upgrade. Each upgrade raises Supply Cap by 5.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>研究</color>按钮，完成人口升级
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>研究</color>按钮，完成人口升级
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Tap Research to complete Supply Upgrade.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: <color=#FFF800FF>人口信息</color>表示已有士兵<color=#FFF800FF>所占人口</color>和可建造的<color=#FFF800FF>人口上限</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: <color=#FFF800FF>人口信息</color>表示已有士兵<color=#FFF800FF>所占人口</color>和可建造的<color=#FFF800FF>人口上限</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Supply shows the Supply of your current troops and your Supply Cap.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>训练</color>页签
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>训练</color>页签
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Tap Train tab.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>训练</color>按钮，训练<color=#FFF800FF>2个弩手</color>({0}/{1})
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>训练</color>按钮，训练<color=#FFF800FF>2个弩手</color>({0}/{1})
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Tap Train to train 2 Crossbowman.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>关闭</color>训练界面
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>关闭</color>训练界面
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Tap to close training screen.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 点击普攻(弱引导)
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 点击普攻(弱引导)
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Tap to use basic attacks.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>建造金矿</color>按钮，消耗金币建造我方金矿
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>建造金矿</color>按钮，消耗金币建造我方金矿
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Tap to build a mine at the cost of Gold.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 初始<color=#FFF800FF>开采效率</color>为<color=#FFF800FF>2金币/秒</color>，<color=#FFF800FF>每20秒</color>提升<color=#FFF800FF>2金币/秒</color>，最高<color=#FFF800FF>10金币/秒</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 初始<color=#FFF800FF>开采效率</color>为<color=#FFF800FF>2金币/秒</color>，<color=#FFF800FF>每20秒</color>提升<color=#FFF800FF>2金币/秒</color>，最高<color=#FFF800FF>10金币/秒</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Production rate starts with 2 Gold/sec, and increases by 2 Gold every 20 seconds, capped at 10 Gold/sec.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>建筑</color>按钮
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>建筑</color>按钮
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Tap Turret button.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: <color=#FFF800FF>拖动箭塔图标</color>在指定位置建造<color=#FFF800FF>2座箭塔</color>({0}/{1})
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: <color=#FFF800FF>拖动箭塔图标</color>在指定位置建造<color=#FFF800FF>2座箭塔</color>({0}/{1})
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Drag the turret icon to the target location and build two turrets.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>维修</color>按钮消耗金币<color=#FFF800FF>维修指定建筑</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>维修</color>按钮消耗金币<color=#FFF800FF>维修指定建筑</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Tap Repair to repair the selected building at the cost of Gold.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>一级城堡</color>图标
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>一级城堡</color>图标
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Tap Lv. 1 Castle's icon.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 点击城堡的<color=#FFF800FF>升级</color>按钮，升级至<color=#FFF800FF>二级城堡</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 点击城堡的<color=#FFF800FF>升级</color>按钮，升级至<color=#FFF800FF>二级城堡</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Tap Upgrade to upgrade to Lv. 2 Castle.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 二级城堡可<color=#FFF800FF>解锁中级兵种</color>，点击<color=#FFF800FF>修女头像</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 二级城堡可<color=#FFF800FF>解锁中级兵种</color>，点击<color=#FFF800FF>修女头像</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Lv. 2 Castle unlocks medium level troops. Now tap Cleric avatar.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>训练</color>按钮，训练<color=#FFF800FF>2个修女</color>({0}/{1})
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 点击<color=#FFF800FF>训练</color>按钮，训练<color=#FFF800FF>2个修女</color>({0}/{1})
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Tap Train to train 2 Clerics.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 标注小龙位置
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 标注小龙位置
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Mark the Holy Scarab's location.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 击杀<color=#FFF800FF>高等级野怪</color>，会掉落<color=#FFF800FF>装备</color>和<color=#FFF800FF>属性书</color>等道具
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 击杀<color=#FFF800FF>高等级野怪</color>，会掉落<color=#FFF800FF>装备</color>和<color=#FFF800FF>属性书</color>等道具
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Gear, Attribute Books, etc., can be dropped from high level monsters.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 标注敌方基地
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 标注敌方基地
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Mark enemy base.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 英雄进入<color=#FFF800FF>光圈范围</color>内<color=#FFF800FF>持续3秒</color>以上可获得<color=#FFF800FF>统帅之刃</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 英雄进入<color=#FFF800FF>光圈范围</color>内<color=#FFF800FF>持续3秒</color>以上可获得<color=#FFF800FF>统帅之刃</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Your Hero will pick up the Blade of Commandment after staying in the circle for 3 seconds.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 在<color=#FFF800FF>使用期限</color>内点击使用可<color=#FFF800FF>召唤</color>沙漠之王，对<color=#FFF800FF>建筑</color>造成巨额伤害
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 在<color=#FFF800FF>使用期限</color>内点击使用可<color=#FFF800FF>召唤</color>沙漠之王，对<color=#FFF800FF>建筑</color>造成巨额伤害
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Use it before it expires to summon the Desert King which deals huge damage against buildings.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 太棒啦！<color=#ffa500ff>{0}</color> 你已经展示了过人的天赋！接下来，让我们开始一场<color=#ffa500ff>实战比赛</color>吧！
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 太棒啦！<color=#ffa500ff>{0}</color> 你已经展示了过人的天赋！接下来，让我们开始一场<color=#ffa500ff>实战比赛</color>吧！
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Great! You have shown great skills! Next, let’s join a live battle!

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 领主大人，您当前的领主等级为：<color=#FFEB04FF>见习领主</color>，通过<color=#FFEB04FF>匹配对战</color>可增加领主等级经验。领主等级可以解锁<color=#FFEB04FF>出战兵种</color>，<color=#FFEB04FF>种族天赋</color>与<color=#FFEB04FF>对战模式</color>。
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 领主大人，您当前的领主等级为：<color=#FFEB04FF>见习领主</color>，通过<color=#FFEB04FF>匹配对战</color>可增加领主等级经验。领主等级可以解锁<color=#FFEB04FF>出战兵种</color>，<color=#FFEB04FF>种族天赋</color>与<color=#FFEB04FF>对战模式</color>。
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: My liege, your current title is Rookie, you can increase your title by playing matches. Increasing your title can unlock soldiers, races, talents, and other battle modes.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: <color=#ffa500ff>英雄限时折扣</color>中，购买新英雄参加战斗吧
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: <color=#ffa500ff>英雄限时折扣</color>中，购买新英雄参加战斗吧
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Hero discount! Buy a new hero to join the fight!

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 领主大人，恭喜您解锁了<color=#ffa500ff>成就系统</color>，<color=#ffa500ff>完成成就</color>可获得<color=#ffa500ff>丰厚奖励</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 领主大人，恭喜您解锁了<color=#ffa500ff>成就系统</color>，<color=#ffa500ff>完成成就</color>可获得<color=#ffa500ff>丰厚奖励</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Congratulations on unlocking the Achievement System. Complete the achievements for great rewards.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: <color=#d2911e>目标</color>：训练强大的<color=#d2911e>部队</color>，摧毁敌方<color=#d2911e>基地</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: <color=#d2911e>目标</color>：训练强大的<color=#d2911e>部队</color>，摧毁敌方<color=#d2911e>基地</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Objective: Assemble a mighty army to destroy enemy bases.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: <color=#d2911e>优先</color>清理<color=green>绿色点</color>的低级野怪快速提升队伍实力
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: <color=#d2911e>优先</color>清理<color=green>绿色点</color>的低级野怪快速提升队伍实力
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: To start let's clean up the low level Wild Monsters. This can quickly improve your strength.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 野怪<color=#ffa500ff>等级越高</color>掉落的装备道具<color=#ffa500ff>品质越高</color>，获得的<color=#ffa500ff>经验、金币越多</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 野怪<color=#ffa500ff>等级越高</color>掉落的装备道具<color=#ffa500ff>品质越高</color>，获得的<color=#ffa500ff>经验、金币越多</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: The higher level of the Wild Monster the more gold, exp, and higher level gear you will receive.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 进攻镇守<color=#ffa500ff>金矿</color>的黄色点野怪，清理完野怪后还可以<color=#ffa500ff>建造金矿</color>获取金币
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 进攻镇守<color=#ffa500ff>金矿</color>的黄色点野怪，清理完野怪后还可以<color=#ffa500ff>建造金矿</color>获取金币
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Remove the monsters from the yellow spots on the map and build a mine on the gold ore there to get more gold even faster.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: <color=#ffa500ff>当前人口</color>超过20时，会进入<color=#ffa500ff>高维修费用</color>模式，<color=#ffa500ff>金币收益</color>减少60%
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: <color=#ffa500ff>当前人口</color>超过20时，会进入<color=#ffa500ff>高维修费用</color>模式，<color=#ffa500ff>金币收益</color>减少60%
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: You will enter high upkeep mode when your Troop Cap is over 20, and Gold yielded will be reduced by 60%.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: <color=#ffa500ff>金矿</color>可以提供稳定的<color=#ffa500ff>金币</color>产出;充足的资源，会给你的战斗带来<color=#ffa500ff>极大</color>的优势
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: <color=#ffa500ff>金矿</color>可以提供稳定的<color=#ffa500ff>金币</color>产出;充足的资源，会给你的战斗带来<color=#ffa500ff>极大</color>的优势
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Mines can provide a stable output of Gold. With enough resources you will have a great advantage in battle.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: <color=#ffa500ff>沙漠之王</color>掉落<color=#F329FF>紫色装备</color>或<color=#ffa500ff>橙色装备</color>;100%掉落<color=#ffa500ff>统帅之刃</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: <color=#ffa500ff>沙漠之王</color>掉落<color=#F329FF>紫色装备</color>或<color=#ffa500ff>橙色装备</color>;100%掉落<color=#ffa500ff>统帅之刃</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Purple and orange gear can be dropped from the Desert King. Blade of Commandment is a guaranteed drop.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 您的<color=#ffa500ff>血量</color>太低了。点击<color=#ffa500ff>回城技能</color>，就能回到基地补充<color=#ffa500ff>血量和法力</color>哦
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 您的<color=#ffa500ff>血量</color>太低了。点击<color=#ffa500ff>回城技能</color>，就能回到基地补充<color=#ffa500ff>血量和法力</color>哦
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: You're in bad shape. Tap Recall to teleport back to your base and restore health and mana.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 圣甲虫掉落<color=#F329FF>紫色装备</color>;击杀后队伍会获强大的增益效果：<color=#ffa500ff>灼热意志</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 圣甲虫掉落<color=#F329FF>紫色装备</color>;击杀后队伍会获强大的增益效果：<color=#ffa500ff>灼热意志</color>
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Purple gear can be dropped from the Holy Scarab. Your team will get a powerful buff after the skill: Searing Will.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 是时候发起<color=#ffa500ff>进攻</color>了，<color=#ffa500ff>摧毁敌人所有基地</color>即可获得<color=#ffa500ff>胜利</color>！
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 是时候发起<color=#ffa500ff>进攻</color>了，<color=#ffa500ff>摧毁敌人所有基地</color>即可获得<color=#ffa500ff>胜利</color>！
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: It’s time to launch an attack and destroy all the enemy bases and win!

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: 拾取<color=#ffa500ff>统帅之刃</color>，可召唤强力<color=#ffa500ff>沙漠之王战士</color>辅助攻城
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: 拾取<color=#ffa500ff>统帅之刃</color>，可召唤强力<color=#ffa500ff>沙漠之王战士</color>辅助攻城
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: Get the Blade of Commandment and use the Desert King to assist in the siege.

ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_SCN: <color=#ffa500ff>英雄战旗</color>增强英雄属性，<color=#ffa500ff>种族战旗</color>强化部队能力。等级越高属性越强。
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_FCN: <color=#ffa500ff>英雄战旗</color>增强英雄属性，<color=#ffa500ff>种族战旗</color>强化部队能力。等级越高属性越强。
ResGuideEventDesc.Desc_words1_EN: <color=#ffa500ff>英雄战旗</color>增强英雄属性，<color=#ffa500ff>种族战旗</color>强化部队能力。等级越高属性越强。
